channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘It’s heartbreaking’: My cousin died and her estranged husband has taken possession of her home. Can we evict him?
item.description: “The house remains in her name. He has since kicked out each of the boys one by one.”

item.title: ‘I don’t want to break up with him’: I’m 32 and my boyfriend wants me to move to Israel. Do I go?
item.description: “I truly see a future with him, but I’ve never imagined myself living in Israel.”

item.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
item.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

item.title: Paramount says Larry Ellison now personally guarantees $40 billion of the Warner Bros. bid
item.description: Larry Ellison now provides a “personal guarantee” of $40 billion of the financing for Paramount’s $108 billion offer to buy Warner Bros. Discovery.

item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: Asset manager Janus Henderson gets bought by Trian, General Catalyst for $7.4 billion
item.description: Asset manager Janus Henderson agreed to be acquired by investors Trian Fund Management and General Catalyst, the companies announced Monday.

item.title: Wells Fargo sees nearly 50% upside for Oracle as AI pessimism looks overdone
item.description: Shares of Oracle have tumbled 42% from their highs of the year, but Wells Fargo sees them climbing 46% from here.

item.title: Loop Capital sees this discount retailer benefiting as consumers continue to ‘trade down’ the price curve
item.description: Loop Capital sees shares rising 25% from here.

item.title: Jefferies says international demand could fuel next leg of growth for this satellite imagery stock
item.description: The investment firm initiated the satellite imagery company at a buy rating.

item.title: Three top Wall Street analysts stay bullish on Nvidia stock. Here's why
item.description: TipRanks spotlights three Wall Street pros who are bullish on Nvidia.

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
